tags.name: xtal-text-input-md
tags.description:
Web component wrapper around Jon Uhlmann's pure CSS material design text input element. https://codepen.io/jonnitto/pen/OVmvPB
Most attributes of input supported
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Web component wrapper around Jon Uhlmann's pure CSS material design text input element. https://codepen.io/jonnitto/pen/OVmvPB
 * Most attributes of input supported
 * @element xtal-text-input-md
 * @slot label
 * @event value-changed - Fires when value changes
 * @event selection-changed -  Fires when autosuggest option selection changes
 *
 */

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
         * Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
         * Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
         * Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
         * @attr
         */

attributes.name: value
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
     * Pass through to input value
     * @attr value
     */

properties.name: disabled

Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: value
properties.jsDoc:
/**
     * Pass through to input value
     * @attr value
     */

events.name: selection-changed
events.description: Fires when autosuggest option selection changes
